profile.profileDescription: Custom profile configuration for the Riverside Church Note for DACS: Make sure to set "ca_objects_x_collections_hierarchy_enabled" and "ca_collections_show_add_child_control_in_inspector" to 1 in /app/conf/app.conf

label.name: Notes
label.description: Notes regarding item

label.name: Georeference
label.description: Coordinates documenting the location of the item

label.name: Spatial coverage
label.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant. Spatial topic and spatial applicability may be a named place or a location specified by its geographic coordinates. Temporal topic may be a named period, date, or date range. A jurisdiction may be a named administrative entity or a geographic place to which the resource applies. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the Thesaurus of Geographic Names [TGN]. Where appropriate, named places or time periods can be used in preference to numeric identifiers such as sets of coordinates or date ranges.

label.name: Coverage notes
label.description: The spatial or temporal topic of the resource, the spatial applicability of the resource, or the jurisdiction under which the resource is relevant. Spatial topic and spatial applicability may be a named place or a location specified by its geographic coordinates. Temporal topic may be a named period, date, or date range. A jurisdiction may be a named administrative entity or a geographic place to which the resource applies. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary such as the Thesaurus of Geographic Names [TGN]. Where appropriate, named places or time periods can be used in preference to numeric identifiers such as sets of coordinates or date ranges.

label.name: Length
label.description: Length of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Width
label.description: Width of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Height
label.description: Height of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Depth
label.description: depth of object; enter in your preferred units (eg. 10cm)

label.name: Weight
label.description: Weight of object; enter in your preferred units

label.name: Library of Congress subject headings
label.description: Library of Congress Subject headings describing this object. To add a new heading simply type the first few letters of the heading and choose the desired one from the displayed list of possible matches.

label.name: Library of Congress Name Authority File
label.description: Enter authority files from the Library Of Congress that apply to this item.

label.name: Rights
label.description: Information about rights held in and over the resource.

label.name: End of restriction notes
label.description: Add any notes regarding the end of restriction.

label.name: Rights holder
label.description: To identify the person or organisation holding or managing the rights related to the resource.

label.name: Copyright statement
label.description: Use to state copyright statements over the resource.

label.name: Style
label.description: Term that identifies the named, defined style, historical or artistic period, movement, group, or school whose characteristics are represented in the work being catalogued.

label.name: Culture
label.description: Name of the culture, people, or nationality from which the work originated.

label.name: Inscriptions and markings
label.description: A description or transcription of any distinguishing or identifying physical lettering, annotations, texts, markings, or labels that are affixed, applied, stamped, written, inscribed, or attached to the work, excluding any mark or text inherent in the materials of which the work is made (record watermarks in Display Materials/Techniques).

label.name: Biography
label.description: Narrative biography for entity. This is the primary text used to document the entity.

label.name: Source of biography
label.description: Source of entity biography. This should be a formal citation if possible. For informal sources a narrative description is acceptable.

label.name: Extent
label.description: This element indicates the extent and the physical nature of the materials being described.

label.name: Administrative/biographical history element
label.description: A description of the context in which the materials being described were created, assembled, and/or maintained is as important as the description of the materials themselves

label.name: Custodial history
label.description: This element provides information on changes of ownership or custody of the material being described, from the time it left the possession of the creator until it was acquired by the repository, that is significant for its authenticity, integrity, and interpretation.

label.name: Accruals
label.description: This element informs the user of anticipated additions to the unit being described. An accrual is an acquisition of archival materials additional to that already in the custody of the repository.

label.name: Scope and content
label.description: This element provides information about the nature of the materials and activities reflected in the unit being described to enable users to judge its potential relevance.

label.name: System of arrangement
label.description: This element identifies the various aggregations of archival materials, their relationships, or the sequence of documents within them.

label.name: Conditions governing access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to the nature of the information in the materials being described, such as those imposed by the donor, by the repository, or by statutory/regulatory requirements.

label.name: Physical access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to any physical characteristics or storage locations that limit, restrict, delay, or otherwise affect access to the materials being described.

label.name: Technical access
label.description: This element provides information about access restrictions due to any technical requirements restrict or otherwise affect access to the materials being described, such as equipment or specific hardware/software required for use.

label.name: Conditions governing reproduction
label.description: This element identifies any restrictions on reproduction due to copyright or other reasons, as well as restrictions on further use of the materials being described, such as publication after access has been provided.

label.name: Other finding aids
label.description: This element identifies any other finding aids to the materials being described particularly if they are available to the user, and provides information about the form and content of those finding aids.

label.name: Languages and scripts of the material
label.description: This element identifies the language(s), script(s), and symbol systems employed in the materials being described, particularly as they may affect its use.

label.name: Event type
label.description: Enter the type of the event.

label.name: Authorization date
label.description: The date when the loan was authorized.

label.name: Loan in date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan out date
label.description: The date a loan will enter the institution.

label.name: Loan return date
label.description: The date a loan is due back to the lending institution.

label.name: Loan conditions
label.description: A statement of the conditions on a loan.

label.name: Loan notes
label.description: General information about the loan.

label.name: Loan purpose
label.description: General information about the purpose of loan.

label.name: Appeared In
label.description: A description or transcription of any distinguishing or identifying physical lettering, annotations, texts, markings, or labels that are affixed, applied, stamped, written, inscribed, or attached to the work, excluding any mark or text inherent in the materials of which the work is made (record watermarks in Display Materials/Techniques).
